channel.title: Creating a TI method on dynverse

item.title: Bare-bones
item.description: library(dynwrap) This vignette describes how to include your own method into the dynverse workflow. Weâ€™ll illustrate this with a very basic method: using one of the components of a PCA as the pseudotime. A method defined in R has two parts: a definition and a function. Definition The definition contains information on the method, its parameters and its required or optional inputs. The possibilities are quite extensive (see dynwrap::definition()), but essentials are:
